comment.body:
Finally got to read/listen through the post. Great to see someone else interested in baroque and even actually playing it! Personally i never got too far away from Bach and Vivaldi, even though i do enjoy counterpoint and should explore it more some day..

The records do seem to have some rough edges, but overall they are enjoyable.

As usual, i'm wondering what license/use conditions are you putting these under (if any)?
